definition: to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)
dagger-axe/abbr. for 戈瑞[ge1 rui4]/(Tw) abbr. for 戈雷[ge1 lei2]
to warn/to alert/to be on the alert/to stand guard/sentinel
to kick a drug habit/to abstain from drugs
Zhu Bajie, character in Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记, with pig-like characteristics and armed with a muckrake/Pigsy in Arthur Waley's translation
to quit/to give up (a bad habit)
to impose martial law/to impose emergency measures
to give up drinking/to abstain from drinking

sentences.english: Stop defeusinging regarding the bush. Will you quit or not?
sentences.chinese: 別拐彎兒抹角了，你到底戒不戒菸？

sentences.english: But after we had started to uphold the precept of not stealing, our lung and nose problesm will gradually diminish.
sentences.chinese: 當我們持守不偷盜戒後，肺部和鼻子只出些小毛病。
別拐彎兒抹角了，你到底戒不戒菸？

sentences.english: Its opposite ring Shihfang for a four- poster three wooden arch.
sentences.chinese: 其對面的戒石坊爲一座四柱三頂的木製牌坊。

sentences.english: After Receiving the Bodhisattva Precepts, Are You a Bodhisattva?
sentences.chinese: 受了菩薩戒你是菩薩嗎？

sentences.english: Monks must abstain from killing living things. Therefore, monks are vegan.
sentences.chinese: 僧侶戒殺生，所以僧人是素食主義者。

sentences.english: Tom dropped (gave up) drinking on the doctor's advice.
sentences.chinese: 聽了醫生的建議，湯姆戒了酒。

sentences.english: One should strictly obey the fourteen basic precepts and possess wisdom and compassion.
sentences.chinese: 嚴守密乘十四條根本戒，具足智慧與大悲力。

sentences.english: When the time comes to wean your child from the pacifier, do it gradually.
sentences.chinese: 如果到了給你的孩子戒奶嘴的時候，請慢着性子來。

sentences.english: What is the difference of precepts between Mahayana and Vajrayana?
sentences.chinese: 大乘戒與密乘戒，有何不同？

sentences.english: Samadhi (concentration) is built on the foundation of Sila.
sentences.chinese: 定建立在戒的基礎之上。

sentences.english: Great achievement starts with detailed observance of precepts.
sentences.chinese: 要有大的成就，首先從微細的戒開始。

sentences.english: People in low level, no kill until they stronger.
sentences.chinese: 低等生之徒，殺戮戒剛強。

sentences.english: U are my can't get rid of poppy 1n my liFe.
sentences.chinese: 伱是我生命裏戒不掉的罌粟。

sentences.english: I eat what I should eat,but I quit eating after 10 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 我照常喫該喫的，但我把十點以後的宵夜戒了。

sentences.english: She managed to stop smoking by sheer willpower.

definition: to violate a religious precept/to smoke or drink after giving up
true statement/incantation (translates Sanskrit: dharani 陀羅尼|陀罗尼)
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
a staff/a rod/cane/walking stick/to flog with a stick (old)
addicted to/fond of/stem corresponding to -phil or -phile
to take the life of a living creature
